meanings.sent1: The sunflower was the yellowest flower in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the yellowest one at the party.
meanings.sent3: The yellowest banana in the bunch was saved for last.
meanings.sent4: The yellowest crayon in the box stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The yellowest paint on the palette brightened the entire canvas.

meanings.definition: To become the most yellow in color.
meanings.sent1: The leaves yellowest as autumn approached.
meanings.sent2: The painting yellowest over time due to exposure to sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The traffic light yellowest just as the car approached the intersection.
meanings.sent4: The sky yellowest as the sun began to set in the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The fields yellowest as the wheat ripened under the summer sun.
